answers.answer: Do you have thick blood?  Get checked for Antiphospholipid syndrome - Wikipedia, the free encyclopediaen.wikipedia.org/wiki/Antiphospholipid_syndromeAntiphospholipid syndrome

question: after reading several responses on this MRI result, I don't have diabetes or high blood pressure.  I have had aslightly high cardio CRP which I believe shows inflammation.  Would this explain the above results on myMRI?
title: minimal chronic small vessel ischemic change
